pullrequest.title: Allow `gz log` to output to a file

content.raw:
If I tried to run an 'output' log file, it fails in this way:

```
#!bash
jrivero@nium log $ gzserver -p 2016-02-26T00\:14\:51.913067/gzserver/state.log  --verbose
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 7.0.0
Copyright (C) 2012-2016 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.1.112
[Msg] 
Log playback:
  Log Version: 1.0
  Gazebo Version: 7.0.0
  Random Seed: 2618522340
  Log Start Time: 18 568000000
  Log End Time: 27 557000000

... <ctrl + c>

jrivero@nium log $ gz log -f 2016-02-26T00\:14\:51.913067/gzserver/state.log -o /tmp/lala.log
Warning [parser.cc:536] XML Attribute[version] in element[sdf] not defined in SDF, ignoring.
Error [parser.cc:550] Required attribute[world_name] in element[sdf] is not specified in SDF.
Warning [parser.cc:451] Unable to parse sdf element[state]
Error [parser.cc:362] parse as sdf version 1.6 failed, should try to parse as old deprecated format

jrivero@nium log $ gzserver -p /tmp/lala.log  --verboseGazebo multi-robot simulator, version 7.0.0
Copyright (C) 2012-2016 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.1.112
[Msg] 
Log playback:
  Log Version: 1.0
  Gazebo Version: 7.0.0
  Random Seed: 2618522340
  Log Start Time: 18 568000000
  Log End Time: 27 557000000
Warning [parser.cc:778] XML Element[state], child of element[sdf] not defined in SDF. Ignoring[state]. You may have an incorrect SDF file, or an sdformat version that doesn't support this element.
[Err] [World.cc:2026] Unable to find model[ground_plane]
[Err] [World.cc:2026] Unable to find model[unit_sphere_0]
...
```

jrivero@nium log $ gzserver -p 2016-02-26T00\:14\:51.913067/gzserver/state.log  --verbose
